pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau today spoke by telephone with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

The Prime Minister congratulated President Sall on hosting the 3rd Conference of the Global Partnership on Education Financing, and reaffirmed Canada’s commitment to education financing, referring to the announcement he recently made at Davos, Switzerland.‎

Together, they also discussed the International Organization of the Francophonie and upcoming summit in Erevan.
